about_the_game:
Welcome to Zombase, the ultimate base-building survival experience where your strategic skills are put to the test! In Zombase, you'll spend your days constructing and fortifying your base, gathering resources, and planning defenses. But when night falls, brace yourself for relentless hordes of zombies that will stop at nothing to breach your defenses.

Seamless Transition: Switch effortlessly between top-down and first-person views to manage your base and fight off zombies from different perspectives.

Dynamic Base Building: Construct, upgrade, and customize your base with a variety of structures, traps, and defenses.

Resource Management: Gather essential resources during the day to strengthen your base and prepare for night-time assaults.

Thrilling Combat: Engage in intense battles against diverse zombie types, each with unique abilities and challenges.

Day/Night Cycle: Adapt your strategy to the changing environment – build by day, defend by night.

Multiplayer Co-op: Team up with friends to build, strategize, and survive the zombie onslaught together.

Immersive Atmosphere: Experience a richly detailed world with stunning graphics and atmospheric sound design.

Are you ready to survive the night and build the ultimate Zombase?
